p3dx_slam Documentation

p3dx_slam

The p3dx_slam package

  • Homepage: http://wiki.ros.org/p3dx_slam

This package contains launch files for running simultaneous localization and mapping (SLAM) on a Pioneer P3-DX robot. At the moment only gmapping is supported, but it should be trivial to add support to other slam solutions.
